seo.description: Hello! I'm Evril Maringka, a passionate and dedicated Semester 5 Computer Science student. I am building a strong foundation in computer science principles and have hands-on experience in various programming languages and technologies.

Hello! I'm Evril Maringka, a passionate and dedicated Semester 5 Computer Science student. I am building a strong foundation in computer science principles and have hands-on experience in various programming languages and technologies.
Chronological collection of my long-form thoughts on programming, leadership, product design, and more.
I've worked on a variety of projects over the years and I'm proud of the progress I've made. Many of these projects are open-source and available for others to explore and contribute to.
If you're interested in collaborating on a project, feel free to reach out to me. I'm always open to new ideas and opportunities.

homepage.title: Unklab Computer Science Student
homepage.description: Hello! I'm Evril Maringka, a passionate and dedicated Semester 5 Computer Science student. I am building a strong foundation in computer science principles and have hands-on experience in various programming languages and technologies.

about.title: I'm Evril.
about.description: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm Evril Maringka, currently in my fifth semester pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I am passionate about technology, problem-solving, and continuously expanding my knowledge in the field.

articles.title: I'm passionate about pushing the boundaries of what's possible and inspiring the next generation of innovators.
articles.description: Chronological collection of my long-form thoughts on programming, leadership, product design, and more.

projects.title: Basic Calculator
projects.description: Built a simple calculator application using Python. This project helped in understanding basic arithmetic operations and user input handling.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: Developed a personal website using HTML and CSS to showcase my portfolio and resume. This project enhanced my knowledge of web design principles.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
projects.description: Created a simple Tic-Tac-Toe game using JavaScript. This project introduced me to game logic and DOM manipulation.

projects.title: Temperature Converter
projects.description: Developed a web application to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: Implemented a basic library management system in Python to manage books, members, and borrowing records. This project helped in understanding file handling and basic OOP concepts.
